articles.author: David M. Herszenhorn, Barbara Moens
articles.title: EU scrambles to patch up relations at Africa summit - POLITICO.eu
articles.description: The grand pivot to Europe’s southern neighbor has not worked out as planned.
articles.content:
It is not easy to pinpoint the nadir of the EU's great pivot to Africa.
The shift in Europe's focus was trumpted with great fanfare by Commission President Ursula von der Leyen and Council President… [+7744 chars]

articles.author: Lenin Ndebele
articles.title: Southern African leaders arrive in Brussels for EU-AU Summit with high hopes - News24
articles.description: Southern African heads of state and their representatives have started arriving in Brussels, Belgium, for the 6th European Union-African Union Summit with high hopes for their respective countries.
articles.content:
• President Emmerson Mnangagwa of Zimbabwe is seeking to re-engage with a post-UK EU gathering.
  • Zambia's president, Hakainde Hichilema, is wishing for more access to the European trade … [+3618 chars]
